It's good to have a place to keep your gear when not in use, hold meetings, and just talk in private without worrying about the nosiness of certain people in public places.

Find your first "victim" The victim is the person you will be watching and spying on.

step: Simmer the rhubarb with the sugar, cloves and water.
Simmer until the rhubarb becomes soft.
Remove from the heat.
Add the mint leaves for decoration.
steps:
```lisp
(:action prepare
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - entity)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?target) (not (prepared ?target)))
  :effect (prepared ?target)
)

(:action take
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?source - container ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?source) (attached ?item ?source))
  :effect (and (not (attached ?item ?source)))
)

(:action dip
  :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object ?substance - substance)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (prepared ?item) (compatible ?item ?substance))
  :effect (dipped ?item ?substance)
)

(:action plant
  :parameters (?p - agent ?resource - object ?l - location)
  :precondition (and 
    (at ?p ?resource)
    (or 
      (and (is_cutting ?resource) (not (dipped_into_rooting_hormone ?resource)))
      (and (is_cutting ?resource) (dipped_into_rooting_hormone ?resource) (not (planted ?resource ?l)))
      (and (prepared ?l) (not (planted ?resource ?l)))
    )
  )
  :effect (and 
    (or 
      (dipped_into_rooting_hormone ?resource)
      (planted ?resource ?l)
    )
  )
)

;; Plan Steps
(prepare ?actor rhubarb)
(take ?actor ?source rhubarb)
(dip ?actor rhubarb cordial)
(plant ?actor rhubarb ?location)
```

similar_task.task: Grow a Rose Bush from Rose Bush Cuttings
step: Prepare the pot or area in your yard where you plan to plant your clipping.
Take a cutting from the rose bush you would like to grow your new bush from.
Moisten the part of the clipping that you just scraped and dip it into rooting hormone.
Immediately plant the cutting.
Pour the ingredients (except the garnish) into a pitcher that can hold 100 ounces.
Ensure everything is mixed thoroughly.
Allow the mixture to chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
Pour the mixture into tall glasses.
Add a chunk of honeydew melon on the side of each glass.
Finished.
task: Make a Pitcher of Melon Pina Coladas
steps:
```lisp
; Step 1: Place melon in blender
(:action place
  :parameters (?actor - person ?item - melon ?container - blender)
  :precondition (and 
      (available ?actor)
      (inventory ?actor ?item)
      (empty ?container)
  )
  :effect (and 
      (in ?item ?container) 
      (not (inventory ?actor ?item))
  )
)

; Step 2: Place pina colada mix in blender
(:action place
  :parameters (?actor - person ?item - pina_colada_mix ?container - blender)
  :precondition (and 
      (available ?actor)
      (inventory ?actor ?item)
      (in melon ?container)
  )
  :effect (and 
      (in ?item ?container) 
      (not (inventory ?actor ?item))
  )
)

; Step 3: Blend the mixture
(:action blend
  :parameters (?bl - blender ?item - melon ?ingredient - pina_colada_mix)
  :precondition (and 
      (in ?item ?bl) 
      (in ?ingredient ?bl)
      (not (power ?bl on))
  )
  :effect (and 
      (smooth ?bl) 
      (power ?bl on) 
      (not (power ?bl off))
  )
)

; Step 4: Place blended mixture in pitcher
(:action place
  :parameters (?actor - person ?item - blended_mixture ?container - pitcher)
  :precondition (and 
      (available ?actor)
      (smooth blender)
      (empty ?container)
  )
  :effect (and 
      (in ?item ?container) 
      (not (smooth blender))
  )
)
```
